official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that efforts of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare to promote the desegregation of public schools should be applied with the same intensity standards, and sanctions in every region of the United States.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House that efforts of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare to promote the desegregation of public schools should be applied with the same intensity, standards, and sanctions in every region of the United States.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that efforts of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare to promote the desegregation of public schools should be applied with the same intensity standards, and sanctions in every region of the United States.
